entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
